headline: ecobee’s New Home Energy Reports Empower Smarter Homes
summary: TORONTO, November 20, 2024--ecobee has introduced Home Energy Reports, a new feature in the ecobee app that helps customers understand the direct impact of their home’s heating and cooling system’s energy use and makes it easy to understand opportunities to improve energy efficiency and savings. The new feature allows customers to make smarter and more sustainable decisions about their home.

headline: Renewable Energy Stocks Q3 Highlights: Sunrun (NASDAQ:RUN)
summary: As the craze of earnings season draws to a close, here’s a look back at some of the most exciting (and some less so) results from Q3. Today, we are looking at renewable energy stocks, starting with Sunrun (NASDAQ:RUN).
